MESSAGE.REORDER_FROM_LAST_ORDER: Do you like to re-order from your last order at ${restaurant}?
MESSAGE.TIMED_OUT_ERROR: Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor connectivity or an error with our servers. Please try again.
MESSAGE.VERIFICATION_CODE_HAS_EXPIRED: Verification code has expired. Do you want to have code resend?

QUICK_STEP_BY_STEP_INTRODUCTION: Here is a quick step by step walk through to your first diner controlled experience
PLACE_THE_QR_CODE_INSIDE_AREA: Place the QR code inside area
WAITER_WILL_ACCEPT_YOUR_CASH_PAYMENT: Waiter will accept your cash payment
CANCEL_ORDER_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to cancel the entire order?
CONVENIENCE_FEE_DESC: ${convenienceFee} per ${level} convenience fee is set by restaurant. ${convenienceFeeDescription}
DO_YOU_WANT_TO_CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT: Do you want to create an account?
CONFIRM_CREATE_NEW_ORDER: You have order items in the cart. Do you want to start a new order?
APPLE_OR_GOOGLE_PAY_DETECTED: We have detected you have ${platform} pay enabled. Do you want to use it as your payment method?
THE_SERVICE_IS_DOWN: The service is down for maintenance or removed. Please try again or upgrade app to latest version.
YOUR_ORDER_IS_NOW_AVAILABLE_FOR_PICK_UP: Your order is now available for pick-up
UPDATE_PROFILE_WITH_VALID_EMAIL: Please update your profile with a valid email address.
LOGIN_FAIL: Looks like you have the wrong email or password
ACCEPT_TOS_AND_PRIVACY_POLICY: Please accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to create new account
INVALID_PASSWORD: The password must be minimum 8 characters with at least 1 upper-case letter, 1 lower-case letter and 1 numeric letter
OLD_NEW_PASSWORD_MATCH: Please enter a password not used before
PLEASE_UPDATE_YOUR_PHONE_NUMBER: Please enter your mobile phone number
INPUT_PASSCODE: Please enter authentication code you received
INPUT_PASSCODE_EMAIL: Please enter passcode to verify your email
UPDATE_PROFILE_DONE: Your profile has been updated successfully
ASK_TO_CHECK_IN: Do you want to check in to work?
ASK_TO_TALK_TO_THE_MANAGER: Would you like to talk to a manager?
PASSWORD_IS_COPIED_TO_CLIPBOARD: Wifi password has been copied to your clipboard
LONGER_WAIT_TIME: There is a longer wait time for current item
SELECT_MINIMUM_ITEMS: Please select the minimum number of items in
EXCEEDED_MAXIMUM_ITEMS: You have exceeded the number of items you can select in
NEEDS_ACCESS_LOCATION_MESSAGE: Please grant share location permission to enable pick-up functionality
UPDATE_LANGUAGE_SUCCESSFULLY: Your language preference has been updated successfully
UPDATE_ALLERGY_INGREDIENTS_SUCCESSFULLY: Your allergy information has been updated successfully
UPDATE_FAVORITE_INGREDIENTS_SUCCESSFULLY: Your favorite foods have been updated successfully
CONFIRM_ACCOUNT: Your account is not confirmed. Please input the SMS code to confirm.
CALL_API_GENERAL_ERROR: An error occurred while processing your request, we are actively addressing the issue.
TOKEN_EXPIRED: User session has expired, please login again.
UPDATE_TO_LATEST_VERSION: The current installed version is out of date, please update to latest version.
NO_INTERNET: No internet connection. Please try again.
PLEASE_ENTER_YOUR_CREDIT_CARD: Please enter your credit card information.
SEAT_IS_RELEASED: Your occupied seat has been released because you are not within proximity of restaurant.
PLEASE_TURN_ON_LOCATION_SERVICES: Please turn on Location Services for best experience.
SERVICE_FEE_DESC: This ${value} service fee helps us operate Qathena.
SERVICE_FEE_DESC_FIXED: This ${value} service fee helps us operate Qathena. The fix fee is applied to orders with subtotal under ${thresholdAmount}.
PLEASE_CHECK_IF_IT_IS_CORRECT: please check if it is correct
PASSWORD_VALIDATE_MESSAGE: The password must be minimum 8 characters with at least 1 upper-case letter, 1 lower-case letter and 1 numeric letter
TAKE_A_FRONT_FACING_PICTURE: Take a front facing picture for facial recognition
NOTIFIED_WHEN_PICK_UP_ORDER_IS_READY: You will be notified when pick-up order is ready.
WE_NEED_TO_VERIFY_YOUR_EMAIL: We need to verify your email to deliver receipts
PLEASE_ENTER_THE_CODE_BELOW: If you've received an email, please enter the code below.
TRY_TO_RESEND_THE_VERIFICATION_EMAIL: If you haven't received an email, you can try to resend the verification email.
REMOVE_ITEM_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
